title: Gamification Project-Based Learning for Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: A process where students conduct science inquiry projects using personal devices (BYOD) and measure learning outcomes through formative assessments integrated with gamification elements.

learning_goals: Students achieve over 80% participation in science inquiry projects using gamification elements (experience points, badges, leaderboards).
Student teams collaboratively solve science problems in PBL environments, incorporating peer feedback at least three times.
Learners improve understanding of science concepts by over 70% through real-time formative assessments provided by gamification systems.

resources: Science experiment kits (simple circuits, plant growth observation sets, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
